name: ERIE COUNTY GERIATRIC CENTER (now, by change of name, Pleasant Ridge Manor) and County of Erie, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE
name_abbreviation: Erie County Geriatric Center v. Commonwealth

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: ERIE COUNTY GERIATRIC CENTER (now, by change of name, Pleasant Ridge Manor) and County of Erie, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James K. McNamara and Kenneth W. Wargo, Quinn, Buseck, Leemhuis, Toohey & Kroto, Inc., Erie, for appellants.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Mary Frances Grabowski, Senior Asst. Counsel, Dept. of Public Welfare, and Jason Manne, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
648 A.2d 775
ERIE COUNTY GERIATRIC CENTER (now, by change of name, Pleasant Ridge Manor) and County of Erie, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WELFARE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1994.
Decided Oct. 12, 1994.
James K. McNamara and Kenneth W. Wargo, Quinn, Buseck, Leemhuis, Toohey & Kroto, Inc., Erie, for appellants.
John A. Kane, Chief Counsel, Mary Frances Grabowski, Senior Asst. Counsel, Dept. of Public Welfare, and Jason Manne, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
